samples.question: Okay, and why do you think some people buy brand name clothes?

samples.question: Are street markets commonly seen around in your country?

samples.question: Do people usually visit farms as part of their leisure activity in your country?
samples.transcript: Yes, they do. in my point of view, and going to farmlands, I do not know, North South Carolina, anything that contain so many beauties and natures and trees and gardens, it can be a soothing experience to experience. And, we can, I do not know, have a lot of good memory and, make a, I do not know, enjoyable atmosphere that we want to release our negative energy. And what are the advantages of having large farmlands in a region one of the advantages of having large farmlands in a region one of the most advantages that I consider to of having a farm a large farmland is that you can live by the nature You can live by the beauty. You can, I do not know, see the animals and, and the nature of, the nature actually. So, and you can just avoid the air pollution and anything that disturbs your life in a, city that is, civilized, that has civilization. All right.

samples.question: Any comments?
samples.transcript: No, I just, so I am an introverted person and I wanted to control my stress, but I was being controlled by stress. So. And there is a solution to controlling it. I know. I am working on it. I am trying to working on it. One of them is to, look to the mirror, see yourself in front of a mirror, and talk to yourself, and imagine that you are the examiner and the candidate at the same time. Record your voice, speak, record your voice, then be the judge. Try to, detect the issues and the shortcomings. You be the judge, then record again, try to remove those mistakes and those issues. Gradually, you will be a better and more fluent speaker.
